I am incredibly excited and honored to announce that our 2022 manuscript in Global Change Biology was selected as winner of the 2022 ESA Ecological Forecasting Outstanding Publication Award!

This award is presented by the ESA Statistical Ecology section ([more information on the award is here](https://www.esa.org/stats/awards/ecological-forecasting-outstanding-publication-award/)).

[Check out EFI's blog post here](https://ecoforecast.org/congratulations-to-kelly-heilman-on-the-2022-esa-ecological-forecasting-award/)
